mapper.insert: insert into notice (title, content, regtime, type) values (#{title}, #{content}, now(), #{type})
mapper.select: select no, title, content, regtime, type from notice order by no desc
select no, title, content, regtime, type from notice where no = #{no}
select no, title, content, regtime, type from notice where title like concat('%', #{keyword}, '%') or content like concat('%', #{keyword}, '%') order by no desc
